title: Centaur
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Susan Gibbard
brief_description: The camera-work, music and colours of this film combine to express the joy of horses and horsemanship. Filmed with members of the Canadian Equestrian Team and designed to capture the essence of the sport where horse and rider seem to move as one. (Awards: Reims, Yorkton, Chantilly)
